patthana23.44:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.44:0.3_0: Standing on the spot, he deteriorate.
patthana23.44:1.1_0: One who doesn’t accumulate a person’s instructions are not preocupations with the teaching. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected.
patthana23.44:2.1_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
patthana23.44:3.1_0: One with settled mind not. Placing the teaching of the noble ones don’t preoccupations with the teaching. Legal thoughts give rise to confidence in those without it.
